title: Brahui - New Testament (Book)
description: Brahui translation of the New Testament published by the Pakistan Bible Society in 1998. The Brahui, Brahvi or Brohi, are a Dravidian-speaking ethnic group principally found in Balochistan, Pakistan.

language.name: Brahui
language.area: South central, Quetta and Kalat region, east Baluchistan and Sind provinces. Also in Afghanistan, Iran, Turkmenistan.
